biotools.summary: Generative cooperative networks for joint surgical smoke detection and removal in order to remove surgical smoke and improve the quality of intra-operative imaging and reduce hazards in image-guided surgery.  This is a highly desirable post-process for many clinical applications.

bioschemas.name: De-smokeGCN

This is a highly desirable post-process for many clinical applications.
